text: “Ndiponso adabwera ndi mkanjo wake (wa Yûsuf) uli ndi magazi abodza. (Bambo wawo pamene adauona mkanjowo uli wosang’ambika) adati: “Koma mitima yanu yakukometserani chinthu (chomwe mwamchitira mnzanu mwa chifuniro chanu; ndipo chimene ine ndingachite ndi) kupirira kwabwino; ndipo Allah ndi Wopemphedwa chithandizo pa zimene mukunenazi.”
